item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 25, 2025 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:

12. You Can Be a Great Designer and Be Completely Unknown (175 points | 73 comments)

25. Asymmetric Content Moderation in Search Markets: The Case of Adult Websites (76 points | 42 comments)

27. There's a Seeker Born Every Minute (2024) (22 points | 8 comments)

29. Microsoft subtracts C/C++ extension from VS Code forks (166 points | 195 comments)
30. Henry James was not at home in America (14 points | 8 comments)
